attributes.action: Replace the office of Prime Minister with a directly elected President.  And replace 'first past the post' electoral system with proportional representation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is intended to demonstrate support for a radical change to how this country elects its legislative representatives and government.

Separation of powers, separation of the Legislative branch of government from the Executive.

A legislative body established by proportional representation as in Europe and a directly elected President as leader of the Executive Branch as in America.
